title: meadow
description: A green meadow under a blue sky. You can see trees to the north.

title: forest
description: You are in a forest. Towering trees blow gently in the breeze.

title: east-of-meadow
description: This part of the meadow looks odd like it's been setup to be a classroom.

title: west-of-meadow
description: You can start to smell the sea from this part of the meadow. Huh -- isn't that odd. There's some mushrooms growing here, and they're in the shape of a ring.

title: airport-lounge
description: You appear to be in some kind of airport terminal lounge. Not the nice kind -- the kind with terrible seats that smells stale and artificial. People are milling about, paying no attention to you. Occasionally, a voice comes over the intercom and announces that a flight is leaving for someplace, but you can\'t make out the gate number or the destination.
